ComicInfo.Title: The Dead Die Once
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dead Die Once
Having barely survived their initial encounter with the sinister undead creatures branded as "Stalkers", the remaining members of Tango Company struggle to outlast and outwit their cunning undead adversaries.
With the team now splintered, each faction must deal with the matter at hand of obtaining some measure of safety. With limited mobility and waning oxygen levels, the teams continue to descend, and fortify themselves in the most primal and savage of ways imaginable.
All the while, General Percival Mitchell faces court martial charges for the perceived botching of Tango Company's current mission and must stand before the governance council, whom so desperately want the truth behind the Roanoke incident buried away and seek a scapegoat to blame for the catastrophe.
With the stakes at their highest and their backs against the wall in their fight for survival, the final fate of the Roanoke colony awaits them as does the ultimate fate of Tango Company.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-11 23:44:07. [CVDB672510]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Francis Penavic, Rage K Ledbetter, Rich Perez
